backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature metadata documenting dropdown UI and theme changes with linked files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing App.tsx, index.css theme, and Tailwind config extensions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables and dark mode styles for layout and components.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the React app at #root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React component rendering a styled dance-style dropdown with selection display and themed cards.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider managing Internet Identity auth state, login flow, and stored identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind variables and base styles defining a warm Indian arts–inspired light/dark color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point wiring QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH color tokens, extended radii, shadows, fonts, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project state, existing features, and pending requests for adding a dance‑style dropdown and related visual theme. Contains metadata like schema version, project name, and issue tracking arrays.
